website_summaries.verdict: The natural formula and teeth-whitening results many users boast about make this brand definitely worth trying.
pros: One of the best values on the market today
Offers an all-natural formula that doesn't have the tendency to irritate the gums
Provides a clean feeling and fresh flavor, as it has a touch of peppermint oil
tube is larger than most competitors
cons: Results may take a bit longer for some users, especially those with tough stains

website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for anyone who wants an alternative to traditional teeth whitening formula; but it may not provide satisfactory results for those with tough stains.
pros: A natural toothpaste that uses activated charcoal to whiten teeth, which isn't likely to cause irritation or tooth pain
Has peppermint oil for a fresh flavor
Less pricey than other charcoal formulas
cons: Noticeable results may take a while or be minimal for users with badly stained teeth

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again. It's way too messy. Not only will it stain your toothbrush, but it will discolor your sink every time you use it. It's a big inconvenience to have to wipe up the sink after every use. I know it seems like it wouldn't make a mess, but even when you rinse, your entire mouth is black and all the particles come out into the sink and needs to be washed away. If you don't do it immediately, it cakes on. It's gross. It also doesn't bubble. My toothbrush times 30 seconds per quadrant, after one, you're without bubbles and it feels dirty. I am going to have to toss this item in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Kabuki

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural toothpaste!!
customer_reviews.text: My mouth feels fresher, the mint flavor is not overpowering, and I am noticing a difference in my teeth. Because there is no foam I would recommend keeping your head close to the sink..... it does seem to splatter quite a bit when rinsing. Other than that I love this paste!!
customer_reviews.author: Uzziyahu65

customer_reviews.title: This Toothpaste Is The New Diamond
customer_reviews.text: This charcoal toothpaste is a hoot! Makes your teeth black ( which might come in handy for Halloween), but I tend to use a small amount on my brush anyway. My teeth do feel cleaner and I have noticed they do look whiter. And, my teeth feel better as if they're being re-mineralized as I brush! I follow with a rinse. I recommend this toothpaste and I'm pretty sure I'll purchase again. :-)
customer_reviews.author: SusanK

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I used lastnight when I got it and this morning. I feel like it's a work in progress, but I didn't expect my teeth to be pearly white after one use. I feel it will work hard core in due time! I noticed a tad whiter after just 2 uses! Excited to see how much whiter they get!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Not the ususl
customer_reviews.text: Ive been buying this toothpaste for almost 2yrs now. ONLY this toothpaste but the one I have now is totally different. It's watery and tastes weird. WTF? Did I get a bad batch? It doesn't even taste like charcoal and mint as usual. Doesn't have the same thickness. It tastes like chemicals and is VERY thin/watery 🤦🏾
customer_reviews.author: Shenna

customer_reviews.title: Great natural teeth whitening, but beware of a dirty sink!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it contains activated charcoal. Beware it will make your sink pretty dirty--you'll have to clean it every few days. But the benefits of activated charcoal are undeniable--natural, effective teeth-whitening and detox for your mouth. It cleans well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LWoW

customer_reviews.title: Enamel Feels Strong & Sensitivity Has Gone Down!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, I have been using this product for about a month, and my teeth feel great. My enamel feels strong and my sensitivity is slowly going down to a zero. After a couple of uses and following some of the awesome tips from the email I was sent from the company I started seeing results in about 3-4 days. I recommend this product to anyone who wants natural and healthy clean gums and teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Adanary

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing toothpaste. My teeth are so much whiter. It has a pleasant taste. I'll never use regular chemical laden toothpaste ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Kayani

customer_reviews.title: Very good product- not messy like the powder.
customer_reviews.text: Very mild toothpaste.Teeth feel squeaky clean afterwards. not nasty aftertaste I mix it with my current toothpaste so i wont have to brush twice as the Rep suggested. My teeth are whiter. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nikeya Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good toothpaste w/out all the crap
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find a toothpaste without a bunch of ingredients, this one works great without all of the other crap in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Artman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toothpaste! Out of all the charcoal products I have tried this is by far the best! My whole family uses it, down to my 6 year old! I have really noticed a difference In my overall mouth health. It has a nice minty taste which also makes it easier to use. I am completely satisfied with the product and will be reordering!
customer_reviews.author: LaaLaa

customer_reviews.title: I like this. I asked my dentist if charcoal toothpaste ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I asked my dentist if charcoal toothpaste really works and he said no it's just abrasive and takes the stains off superficially. (That seems okay to me!)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Messy but good
customer_reviews.text: This really works. It is messy and you must clean your sink each time but it definitely works. My teeth are at least 2 shades lighter.
customer_reviews.author: dlawrence1953

customer_reviews.title: Although I didn’t see a change in the appearance of ...
customer_reviews.text: Although I didn’t see a change in the appearance of my teeth I gave this product to my sister and can notice a difference in hers!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: A great product, you see the difference with each use
customer_reviews.text: A great product, you see the difference with each use. Brush twice a day and you will see bright teeth. Yes it is messy, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Bright White Teeth
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothpaste! Has a great mint flavor and made my teeth super white! A little bit messier than the last charcoal toothpaste I bought, but the results are amazing. Made my husband use it and he had tea stained teeth. Now they are bright white!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS TOOTHPASTE
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that my teeth were whiter RIGHT AWAY!!! The bottle is very big, which is wonderful and the email that was sent with the product to tell you how to use it was informative. I highly enjoy this product and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice much of a difference !’ I like Colgate White
customer_reviews.author: Helaine Marie Balboni

customer_reviews.title: white  white!!!
customer_reviews.text: My teth are getting soo white from first time! I'm in a week and the difference is awesome !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it though it's a bit messy to use
customer_reviews.text: It does seem to lighten the teeth. I like it though it's a bit messy to use.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After using it for a week it started to damage my gums.
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toothpaste! I saw an immediate difference in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent toothpaste! I saw an immediate difference in the cleaning effectiveness as well removal of stains. It even appeared to still be working after brushing. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, does what it says and I have only used it for 2 months. Very happy and expectations were exceeded. Thank you for having great products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not seeing much results with whitening, but have not ...
customer_reviews.text: Not seeing much results with whitening, but have not used it consistently for 2 weeks yet. It is messy and I find myself using a lot of water to wash it down the drain. Probably will not purchase again as we just need a natural product that is more low key.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gan

customer_reviews.title: Buy, if you want really yellow teeth. Gross
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! The only thing this toothpaste does is make your teeth super yellow with plaque buildup on your gums. Worst toothpaste I have ever used, and I am all about coconut and bamboo charcoal toothpaste. Skip this and save yourself the time money and yellow teeth
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Stained my tongue
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and I am used to charcoal toothpastes. However, didn't really care for the taste and the toothpaste (black) was extremely hard to remove from my tongue.
customer_reviews.author: June B

customer_reviews.title: Results by the end of September
customer_reviews.text: New update Had oral surgery so it will be by the end of next month before I know for sure
customer_reviews.author: Tasha26

customer_reviews.title: I think it whitens a but better also, although all charcoal toothpaste I've tried has ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other brands and this one does make your mouth/teeth blacker but it rinses right off. I think it whitens a but better also, although all charcoal toothpaste I've tried has worked well. Only drawback is It makes more of a mess in the sink so I don't like when my boys use it
customer_reviews.author: Bads

customer_reviews.title: The best toothpaste I've tried so far ❤️ My teeth were ...
customer_reviews.text: The best toothpaste I've tried so far ❤️ My teeth were noticeably whiter after the first use and my mouth feels really clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not your ordinary toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: It is fine as a toothpaste and time will tell if there is any whitening power. I have decided to use it at night only as even after swishing repeatedly I have missed a black speck or so and wouldn't want to be caught with that on my gums or teeth. It really requires a closed mouth while brushing or there are black spatters everywhere. I got that under control right away.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Mmm... My teeth feel great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best! After just one use, my teeth have never looked whiter, brighter or my mouth felt cleaner! The only slight warning I would give is beware of the charcoal splatter in and around you're sink, especially if you voraciously brush your teeth. It's rather amusing but no cause for alarm. It quickly rinses off. It's rather amusing. Perhaps I'll use less toothpaste on my toothbrush next time. 😁
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and value charcoal toothpaste, to date
customer_reviews.text: I've tried most other charcoal toothpastes, and Peasant brand's feels the most effective, and gives me the most value, for the highest amount of active ingredients. I can taste the baking soda, bentonite clay, and charcoal - not in a bad way - and that tells me the product is more interested in effectiveness, than taste, or presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Billuame

customer_reviews.title: I use this only 3-4 times a week but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this only 3-4 times a week but it cleans my teeth well. My dentist asked me what I was doing differently! Has little to no flavor and does not foam up. Can be messy, so I usually use it in the shower. If you struggle brushing your tongue you may want to avoid as it does get all over your tongue and has to be brushed off.
customer_reviews.author: D. Benevento

customer_reviews.title: and sink/shower looks like I slaughtered an eel when I
customer_reviews.text: No whitening effect, and sink/shower looks like I slaughtered an eel when I use
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good toothpaste that’s working at whitening and removing tartar. Use every 2 days or so.
customer_reviews.author: Terry A

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I've used activated charcoal before so the whiteness didn't surprise me. But I never used it in this pasty way before and it is good. I still get the white teeth from it so good product I'll def buy more. I wonder if I can use it as a face mask?
customer_reviews.author: Peter J.-P.

customer_reviews.title: why?
customer_reviews.text: I had to try this because of all the rage. I don't find it to do anything more than regular toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: susie520

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Great at first.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it at first. Though messy. Splattered my sink.. But worst was it seems to of made my gums bleed after long term use. It did whiten my teeth, did not stain my sink or brush.
customer_reviews.author: tigerwitch

customer_reviews.title: Never will return to mainstream toothpaste again.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t taste as good as others I’ve tried. Between the 3 different types of charcoal toothpaste I’ve been using, my cavities have gone from true cavities to healed or just sift spots on my teeth.
customer_reviews.author: ArtLady’60

customer_reviews.title: No foaming ..love it
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and no foaming. Super fine coconut charcoal. ..good for brushing or swishing. Tube busted at the seam so be careful not to squeeze too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Pupawheelie

customer_reviews.title: Dentist teeth cleaning in a tube
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a feeling as if you just left the orthodontists after a fresh cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good toothpaste, I love how clean my teeth feel after however I don't really like the way that my mouth tastes after. Not my favorite charcoal toothpaste but still a really good option!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not as minty as I would have liked. Although
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this toothpaste for about a week now. I can definitely see a difference in the whiteness of my teeth. It is not as minty as I would have liked. Although, I know that's because of the so called regular toothpaste I would use like Arm & Hammer. But after learning how harmful it is for your mouth, I have been switching to more natural hygiene products. My daughter and husband have used it as well and they like it but again not used to no minty flavor. Overall I like it and it is definitely something I would have to get used to.
customer_reviews.author: Faithnlove

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well for surface stains. still using whitening strips. make a huge mess though!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Miller Solley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product say a difference after a few times of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Ruffo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent select when it comes to Charcoal Toothpastes.
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is probably one if the best toothpastes I've tried so far. I've been ordering multiple charcoal based pastes since last year when I found out their benefits. This one, by far is a winner. It whitened my teeth on the first brush, noticeably. One thing to keep in mind is that this product is messy in terms of keeping your sink from looking like a horror movie scene, nevertheless I believe it looks cool. Very minimal taste if any and definitely deserves to be tried out if you're into the whole charcoal toothpaste craze.
customer_reviews.author: Fermin Rodarte

customer_reviews.title: Super messy.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love charcoal toothpaste, but I really don’t. I love natural toothpaste, but I think I will stick to one with the bentonite Clay base. Charcoal is extremely messy and you have to clean your sink after every single time you brush your teeth. I don’t know if it’s just me, but it splatters everywhere and I will find little tiny black dots on everything.
customer_reviews.author: LawFam6

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the whole mouth
customer_reviews.text: Was glad to find and have purchased it, and slightly doubtful this would do anything. But after using this toothpaste for few days the teeth became noticeably whiter. After 10 days, even more. Also noticed charcoal toothpaste leaves mouth cleaner and more pleasant feeling than other paste, even fluoride free. This probably applies to most charcoal tooth paste or tooth powders.
customer_reviews.author: Orange2017

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great – very thick toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great – very thick toothpaste, and cleans extremely well! I had to take one star off for the packaging, the tube is short and stout which makes it very difficult to get the last of the toothpaste out of the tube. Unfortunately because of the packaging, I will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: patterma

product_meta.title: Activated Charcoal Toothpaste for Natural Teeth Whitening with Peppermint Essential oil
feature_bullets: ANCIENT FORMULA - without all the chemicals found in modern day toothpastes
WHITENS TEETH - Activated Charcoal is a highly adsorbent porous substance that binds to things like tannins left from coffee, wine, etc that stain teeth
HEALTHY ALKALINE BALANCE - cleans your teeth without enamel eating acidity found in regular toothpastes
100% EDIBLE INGREDIENTS - charcoal toothpaste without toxic chemicals found in other toothpastes that are a struggle to even pronounce
REMOVES BAD BREATH - avoid cavities, tooth decay and gingivitis with natural ingredients
